verses.verse: This <S%G5124><s%> is the third <S%G5154><s%> time I am coming <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>. In <S%G1909><s%> the mouth <S%G4750><s%> of two <S%G1417><s%> or <S%G2532><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> witnesses <S%G3144><s%> shall <S%G2476><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> word <S%G4487><s%> be established <S%G2476><s%>.

I told you before <S%G4280><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> say beforehand <S%G4302><s%>, as if <S%G5613><s%> I were present <S%G3918><s%>, the second time <S%G1208><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> being absent <S%G548><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> I write <S%G1125><s%> to them <S%G3588><s%> which before have sinned <S%G4258><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> others <S%G3062><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%>, if <S%G1437><s%> I come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G99999><s%> again <S%G3825><s%>, I will <S%G5339><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> spare <S%G5339><s%>:

Since <S%G1893><s%> you seek <S%G2212><s%> a proof <S%G1382><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> speaking <S%G2980><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> me <S%G1698><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> <S%G99999><s%> toward <S%G5209><s%> you is <S%G770><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> weak <S%G770><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> is mighty <S%G1414><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> though <S%G2532><s%> he was crucified <S%G4717><s%> through <S%G1537><s%> weakness <S%G769><s%>, yet <S%G235><s%> he lives <S%G2198><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> the power <S%G1411><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>. For <S%G1063><s%> we also <S%G2249><s%> are weak <S%G770><s%> in <S%G846><s%> him <S%G235><s%>, but <S%G2198><s%> we shall live <S%G4862><s%> with <S%G846><s%> him <S%G1537><s%> by <S%G1411><s%> the power <S%G2316><s%> of God <S%G1519><s%> toward <S%G5209><s%> you <S%G1722><s%>.

Examine <S%G3985><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%>, whether <S%G1487><s%> you are <S%G2075><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the faith <S%G4102><s%>; prove <S%G1381><s%> your own selves <S%G1438><s%>. Don <S%G3756><s%>'t you know <S%G1921><s%> your own selves <S%G1438><s%>, how that <S%G3754><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>, unless <S%G1509><s%> you are <S%G2075><s%> <S%G99999><s%> reprobates <S%G96><s%>?
But <S%G1161><s%> I trust <S%G1679><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> you shall know <S%G1097><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> are <S%G2070><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> reprobates <S%G96><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> I pray <S%G2172><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> that <S%G4160><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> <S%G99999><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> no <S%G3367><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%>; not <S%G3756><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> should appear <S%G5316><s%> approved <S%G1384><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> you <S%G5210><s%> should do <S%G4160><s%> that which <S%G3588><s%> is honest <S%G2570><s%>, though <S%G1161><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> be <S%G5600><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> reprobates <S%G96><s%>.
For <S%G1063><s%> we can do <S%G1410><s%> <S%G99999><s%> nothing <S%G3756><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> the truth <S%G225><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> the truth <S%G225><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> are glad <S%G5463><s%>, when <S%G3752><s%> we are weak <S%G770><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> you <S%G5210><s%> are <S%G5600><s%> strong <S%G1415><s%>: and <S%G1161><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> we wish <S%G2172><s%>, even your <S%G5216><s%> perfection <S%G2676><s%>.

Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G99999><s%> I write <S%G1125><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> being <S%G2443><s%> absent <S%G548><s%>, lest <S%G3361><s%> being present <S%G3918><s%> I should use <S%G5530><s%> sharpness <S%G664><s%>, according <S%G2596><s%> to the power <S%G1849><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> has given <S%G1325><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> edification <S%G3619><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> destruction <S%G2506><s%>.

Finally <S%G3063><s%>, brothers <S%G80><s%>, rejoice <S%G5463><s%>. Be perfected <S%G2675><s%>, be of good comfort <S%G3870><s%>, be <S%G5426><s%> of one <S%G846><s%> mind <S%G5426><s%>, live in peace <S%G1514><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> the God <S%G2316><s%> of love <S%G26><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>.
Greet <S%G782><s%> one another <S%G240><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> a holy <S%G40><s%> kiss <S%G5370><s%>.

The grace <S%G5485><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the love <S%G26><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the communion <S%G2842><s%> of the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%>, be with <S%G3326><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>. Amen <S%G281><s%>. The second letter to the Corinthians was written from Philippi, a city of Macedonia, by Titus and Lucas.
